name: FateAddon
title: Fate Adddon
description: A module to help you manage Fate conditions (including Condensed-style stress). Pairs well with Popcorn. This version is completely different from FateAddon v.1 and uses a different methodology for storing data inside the character sheet rather than using flags.  Designed for use with Nick East's Fate Core system.
author: Richard Bellingham (Skimble)
